statements: SELECT * FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE patent_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE generic_version_available = TRUE;
SELECT expiration_date, patent_id FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE product_name LIKE 'Aspirin%';
SELECT * FROM patent_expiration_dates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND generic_version_available = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE patent_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE expiration_date < '2023-06-30' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT patent_id, product_name FROM patent_expiration_dates WHERE generic_version_available = FALSE AND product_name LIKE '%tablet%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_patents, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM expiration_date) AS exp_year FROM patent_expiration_dates GROUP BY exp_year HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM generic_versions WHERE launch_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY generic_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT patents.product_name, generic_versions.generic_name FROM patents INNER JOIN generic_versions ON patents.id = generic_versions.patent_id;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE product_name = 'Acme Product' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT patent_id, generic_name, launch_date FROM generic_versions WHERE launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patents JOIN generic_versions ON patents.id = generic_versions.patent_id;
SELECT product_name, COUNT(*) AS total_generics FROM patents JOIN generic_versions ON patents.id = generic_versions.patent_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_generics > 0;
SELECT * FROM patents
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2021-12-31'
SELECT patent_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM patents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT manufacturer_name, headquarters_location FROM manufacturers
SELECT generic_id, generic_name, launch_date FROM generic_versions
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, product_name FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT p.product_name, g.generic_name, m.manufacturer_name FROM patents p INNER JOIN generic_versions g ON p.patent_id = g.patent_id INNER JOIN manufacturers m ON g.generic_id = m.manufacturer_id;
SELECT * FROM manufacturers ORDER BY headquarters_location DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE product_name = 'Example Product';
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT p.product_name, m.name AS manufacturer_name FROM patents p JOIN manufacturers m ON p.id = m.id;
SELECT id, product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM manufacturers WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT p.product_name, g.launch_date, m.name FROM generic_versions g JOIN patents p ON p.id = g.patent_id JOIN manufacturers m ON m.id = g.manufacturer_id

SELECT m.name AS manufacturer_name, COUNT(po.patent_id) AS total_patents FROM manufacturers m LEFT JOIN patent_owners po ON m.id = po.manufacturer_id GROUP BY m.name HAVING total_patents > 5 ORDER BY total_patents DESC
SELECT p.product_name, g.launch_date FROM generic_versions g JOIN patents p ON p.id = g.patent_id WHERE g.launch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM generic_versions ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT patent_id, generic_name FROM generic_versions INNER JOIN patents ON generic_versions.patent_id = patents.patent_id;
SELECT product_name, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT generic_name, launch_date FROM generic_versions WHERE launch_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT company_name, generic_name FROM companies JOIN generic_versions ON companies.company_id = generic_versions.generic_id;
SELECT manufacturer_name, company_name FROM manufacturers JOIN companies ON manufacturers.company_id = companies.company_id;
SELECT patent_id, company_name FROM patents JOIN patents_owners ON patents.patent_id = patents_owners.patent_id JOIN companies ON patents_owners.company_id = companies.company_id;
